title: 'Marketing 101': Republicans scramble to sell key GOP bill after Trump branding fails
description: Republicans are growing increasingly frustrated on their inability to sell the American people on the  "One Big Beautiful Bill Act," reports Al Weaver in The Hill. "Talk about the massive tax package largely evaporated after Labor Day amid high-stakes fights …
